title: [BSOG0018] The Honorable Sleaze - Broad Street Boogie

As youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll hear, over the past year, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s continued to perfect his art on both the production and lyrical fronts. Over the past few years, Sleaze has done a good job of developing a unique rhyme style and sound. If the mainstream hip-hop world was about QUALITY as opposed toÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ shootÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ I donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t even know what itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ã¢â‚¬ËœaboutÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ todayÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ never-the-lessÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ if it were about quality, Sleaze could find himself a place in the mainstream. However, this isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t the case, with the exception of a few, REAL hip-hopÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s place is now under the underground. There are too many only interested in replicating formulas, this has been the case for nearly 20 years. Mainstream hip-hop is now represented by biters biting biters biting biters. No room for unique voices such as Sleaze and the host of talented EMCEES holding it down for Richmond, Virginia aka RVA on this release. Consider yourself one of the lucky ones, to be clued into great music that many others are too oblivious to care about. Thank you for checking out REAL hip-hop.
